name: Teach-To-Win
description:
Teach-To-Win

A simple game created for a game jam, about juggling your work while training up your coworkers in order to manage the workload long-term!

How To Play

Use the left and right arrow keys to move around!
Use SPACE at your desk to do some work!
Use SPACE at your colleagues desks to help them when they are stuck!

Hint: Helping your colleagues can lead to skill improvements, making them more independent in the long run.

How To Install
Download and install Python 3.8 or higher from python.org
Install the requirements, specifically pygame (for more info see pygame.org).
